issues.title: Proposed semantic/ module not implemented
issues.description: Complete implementation blueprint exists in documentation but module is not created in codebase. Document specifies full file structure, function signatures, and integration points.
issues.current_state: No semantic/ directory in packages/api/src/modules/knosia/. No router mounts or imports.
issues.desired_state: Decision needed: Either implement as API module in packages/api/src/modules/knosia/semantic/ OR move to liquid-connect package as data transformation layer

issues.title: activity/ module completely undocumented
issues.description: Module is fully implemented with complete file structure (router, queries, schemas, mutations) but has no documentation. Purpose, endpoints, and integration points are unknown.
issues.current_state: packages/api/src/modules/knosia/activity/ exists and is router-mounted at /activity, but not mentioned in any documentation
issues.desired_state: Add activity/ module to project structure documentation with purpose, key endpoints, and integration examples

issues.title: Module naming mismatch: conversation vs thread
issues.description: Documentation refers to 'conversation' module but actual implementation uses 'thread'. API endpoint is /thread not /conversation. Database tables use 'conversation' naming. This creates confusion across the stack.
issues.current_state: Implementation: packages/api/src/modules/knosia/thread/ with router mount at /thread. Documentation: references conversation/ module. Database: knosia_conversation table.
issues.desired_state: Update all documentation to use 'thread' consistently (renaming module would be breaking change)

issues.title: Unclear shared/ module scope and purpose
issues.description: Documentation describes shared/ as 'shared utilities' but actual implementation contains semantic.ts and transforms.ts with substantial logic. Naming collision with proposed semantic/ module. Unclear what qualifies for shared/ vs dedicated module.
issues.current_state: packages/api/src/modules/knosia/shared/ contains semantic.ts, transforms.ts with tests. Documentation vague about contents and relationship to proposed semantic/ module.
issues.desired_state: Document actual shared/ contents, clarify relationship to proposed semantic/ module, define guidelines for what belongs in shared/

issues.title: Wrong package location for semantic/dashboard modules
issues.description: Documentation places semantic/ and dashboard/ in API layer but these are data transformation logic that should belong in liquid-connect package.
issues.desired_state: If implementing as data transformation, move to packages/liquid-connect/src/ and update all documentation accordingly
